      Removes the given scope from the collection.

      A ViewNode representing an array-of-objects structure.

      A ViewNode representing an array-of-objects structure where each object is a resolvable reference.

      A ViewNode representing an array-of-values structure.

      A node that contains other nodes as children.

      A ViewNode that represents a metadata value.

      A ViewNode representing an object structure.

      A ViewNode representing an object structure where the object is a resolvable reference.
      interface  SpliceNode
      A ViewNode representing the splicing of a separate view generation/application processing operation.
      interface  SubtypeNode
      A ViewNode that represents a subtype.
      interface  UpdatableNode
      A ViewNode that can be used to update a corresponding model value.
      interface  UpdatableValueNode
      A ValueNode that can be used to update a property of a model.

      A ViewNode representing a simple value.
      interface  ViewNode
